adjectives.description: quietsome (comparative more quietsome, superlative most quietsome)

entries.meaning: (archaic) Characterised or marked by quietness; calm; still; tranquil
examples: Let no false treason seek us to entrap, / Nor any dread disquiet once annoy / The safety of our joy; / But let the night be calm and quietsome, / Without tempestuous storms or sad affray, / Like as when Jove with fair Alcmena lay, [...]
